news_header: Israel and Hezbollah agreed on a truce in November, requiring Hezbollah to withdraw north of the Litan River and Israel to pull out of Lebanon. The deadline for withdrawal was initially set for January 26 but has been postponed to February 18, with a potential further extension to April 2.
news_original_title: Media: Hizbollah ja Israel päässeet sopuun Israelin joukkojen läsnäolon jatkamisesta Libanonissa
news_text: Israel has requested an additional 10-day extension until February 28.
